parameter.name: codeA
parameter.documentation: The A code that is to be tested.

parameter.name: codeB
parameter.documentation: The B code that is to be tested.

parameter.name: system
parameter.documentation: The code system in which subsumption testing is to be performed.

parameter.name: version
parameter.documentation: The version of the code system.

parameter.name: outcome
parameter.documentation: The subsumption relationship between code/Coding A and code/Coding B.
